title: Chill Gamer
description: Chill Gamer is a user-friendly game review platform designed to allow users to explore and share game reviews. This project includes user authentication, review management, and dynamic content features.

briefDescription.overview: Chill Gamer is a user-friendly game review platform designed to allow users to explore and share game reviews.
briefDescription.focus: Provides an intuitive and 'chill' experience for users to engage with game reviews, ratings, and watchlists.

navbar: Home, All Reviews, Add Review (Protected), My Reviews (Protected), Game Watchlist (Protected)
User Avatar (Profile photo with name tooltip)
homePage: Highest Rated Games section (6 cards with ratings, 'Explore Details' button)
2 extra meaningful sections (dynamic data from MongoDB)

keyPages.registerPage: User registration with email, password, and name.
keyPages.addReviewPage: Submit game reviews (game name, cover image, rating, description, etc.).
keyPages.reviewDetailsPage: Displays review details with 'Add to Watchlist' functionality.
keyPages.allReviewsPage: Lists all reviews with sorting/filtering options by rating, year, and genre.
keyPages.myReviewsPage: Shows reviews submitted by the logged-in user with update and delete options.
keyPages.updateReviewPage: Allows users to edit previously submitted reviews.
keyPages.gameWatchlistPage: A private page for users to view/manage games in their personal watchlist.

additionalFeatures.404Page: Custom 'Not Found' page for invalid URLs.
additionalFeatures.sortAndFilter: Sort reviews by rating or year, filter by genres.

challengesFaced: Handling large data for game reviews efficiently.
Implementing real-time updates for user interactions.
improvements: Adding a recommendation engine for personalized game suggestions.

title: Humanity
description: This project is a user-friendly platform for volunteer management, enabling users to create, update, and delete volunteer need posts.

details.briefDescription: A volunteer management platform for creating and fulfilling volunteer needs.

navbar: Home, Volunteer Posts, Add Post (Protected), My Posts (Protected)
User Avatar (Profile photo with name tooltip)
homePage: Featured posts section showcasing urgent volunteer needs
Easy navigation to add or manage posts
footer: Social media links, contact details, and site credits

keyPages.registerPage: Allows new users to sign up.
keyPages.addPostPage: Enables users to create a new volunteer post with title, description, and image.
keyPages.volunteerPostsPage: Displays all volunteer posts with search and filter options.
keyPages.myPostsPage: Shows all posts created by the logged-in user with update and delete options.

additionalFeatures.404Page: Custom 'Not Found' page for invalid URLs.
additionalFeatures.loadingSpinner: Displays loading state for data-heavy pages.
additionalFeatures.notifications: Real-time notifications for new volunteer opportunities.

challengesFaced: Designing an intuitive UI for managing volunteer needs.
improvements: Adding a feature to track volunteer responses.
Integrating calendar functionality for scheduling events.

title: Job Seeker
description: A Full Stack Job-Seeking Website designed to streamline the process of connecting job seekers with potential employers.

details.briefDescription: A job-seeking platform connecting employers with potential candidates.

navbar: Home, Jobs, Post Job (Protected), My Jobs (Protected)
User Avatar (Profile photo with name tooltip)
homePage: Search bar for finding specific jobs
footer: Social media links, company information, and contact details

keyPages.registerPage: Allows new users to sign up.
keyPages.postJobPage: Enables employers to create job postings.
keyPages.jobDetailsPage: Displays detailed job information with an 'Apply Now' option.
keyPages.myJobsPage: Lists jobs posted by the logged-in employer with options to update or delete.

additionalFeatures.404Page: Custom 'Not Found' page for invalid URLs.
additionalFeatures.sortingAndFiltering: Filter jobs by location, experience, and skills.

challengesFaced: Creating an efficient filtering and sorting mechanism for job searches.
Ensuring data consistency between employer and job seeker interactions.
improvements: Enhancing the search algorithm for better accuracy.

title: Coffee House
description: A comprehensive Full Stack Express and Node.js project named Coffee House, where users can perform Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations seamlessly. This project also integrates user authentication to ensure secure access.

details.briefDescription: A full-stack application focusing on CRUD operations and user authentication for managing coffee shop services.

navbar: Home, Menu, Add Coffee (Protected), Update Coffee (Protected)
User Avatar (Profile photo with name tooltip)
homePage: Quick links to manage coffee inventory
footer: Contact details, social media links, and site map

keyPages.addCoffeePage: Allows users to add coffee details (name, price, description, image).
keyPages.updateCoffeePage: Enables users to update existing coffee details.
keyPages.menuPage: Displays all available coffee items dynamically.

additionalFeatures.404Page: Custom 'Not Found' page for invalid URLs.
additionalFeatures.crudOperations: Full CRUD functionality for managing coffee items.

challengesFaced: Integrating Firebase authentication with React and Express.
Optimizing backend APIs for faster data retrieval.
improvements: Adding a real-time order management system.
Enhancing UI for better customer experience.
